chart.title: Page Impressions by SPWeb (Last 24 hours)
chart.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis-page | eval Url=case(s_port==80,"http://"+cs_host+"/",s_port==443,"https://"+cs_host+"/",isnotnull(s_port),s_proto+"://"+cs_host+":"+s_port+"/") | lookup SPWebApplication Url OUTPUT FarmId,Id as WebApplicationId | where isnotnull(WebApplicationId) | lookup SPIDS cs_uri_stem,WebApplicationId OUTPUT SiteId,WebId,ContentDatabaseId | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId,FarmId OUTPUT Title | eval x=1 | timechart per_minute(x) by Title

chart.title: Unique Users by SPWeb (Last 24 hours)
chart.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis-page | eval Url=case(s_port==80,"http://"+cs_host+"/",s_port==443,"https://"+cs_host+"/",isnotnull(s_port),s_proto+"://"+cs_host+":"+s_port+"/") | lookup SPWebApplication Url OUTPUT FarmId,Id as WebApplicationId | where isnotnull(WebApplicationId) | lookup SPIDS cs_uri_stem,WebApplicationId OUTPUT SiteId,WebId,ContentDatabaseId | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId,FarmId OUTPUT Title | timechart dc(cs_username) by Title

table.title: Top Pages (Last 24 hours)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis-page cs_username!="-" | eval Url=case(s_port==80,"http://"+cs_host,s_port==443,"https://"+cs_host,isnotnull(s_port),s_proto+"://"+cs_host+":"+s_port) | eval fullUrl = Url + cs_uri_stem | top fullUrl | eval percent=round(percent,2) | rename fullUrl as "Page URL",count as "Page Impressions"

table.title: Top Visitors (Last 24 hours)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis-page cs_username!="-" | top src_user | eval percent=round(percent,2) | eval modUsername=replace(src_user,"\\\\","\\\\") | rename src_user as "Username",count as "Page Impressions"

table.title: Top Browsers (Last 24 hours)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis-page cs_username!="-" | lookup useragent cs_user_agent AS cs_User_Agent OUTPUT browser browserversion | eval cs_user_agent=replace(cs_User_Agent,"\+"," ") | eval Browser=if(browser=="unknown",cs_user_agent, browser + " " + browserversion) | top Browser | eval percent=round(percent,2) | rename count as "Page Impressions"
